title: Vintage 14.5oz Men's Jeans Slim Fit Straight Leg Raw Selvedge Denim Pants One Wash
description: DURABLE MATERIALS:This Slim fit jeans is made with high quality cotton denim that will hold up over time -- even through long days on the job; 100% Cotton,comfortable and breathable. Inseam is 30in and 32in,Please choose according to the length of pants you usually wear;

SELVEDGE DENIM:This Mid to high rise jeans is Selvedge Denim pants,which is with red-line selvedge,14.5oz fabric,mid weight,great for fall and spring;Warp yarn and the weft yarn dyed that will fade over time This Jeans is One Wash,will not shrink again after wash,so please do not worry about the size.

CLASSIC 5-POCKET STYLING: A vintage slim fit jeans designed with an authentic five-pocket style.Front pockets are with copper rivetsm,make the pants stronger; a timeless five-pocket style, perfect for most occasions.Vintage Customized Button.
JEANS FOR ALL:This jean is slim fit,but will not tight,with straight leg; Add a classic denim jean to your everyday rotation or try out a new alternative wash
SPECIFICATIONS:Button closure;Red Tornado real leather label at back waistband

A LIFETIME OF QUALITY:Focus on Vintage clothing, Red Tornado has produced quality apparel with durability and long-lasting construction in mind. Red Tornado is committed to designing clothing that conforms to your body, allowing you to move through life freely.

This Men's slim fit jeans made from 14.5oz selvedge denim;One Wash,so it will not shrink after washingInseam is 30in and 32in,Please choose according to the length of pants you usually wear; the material is 100% Cotton(high quality);Color:BlackThis Jeans is Slim fit with Straight leg,you can wear it as casual pants. This jeans is mid to high rise,vintage selvedge denim pants,with classic five pockets,retro buttons,and great sewing,you will love it.
